concept.title: What is the Division of numbers?
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what is Division of numbers.

conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of dividing numbers, you must understand what division is. The term “Division” represents a mathematical operation used to split a number into equal parts. Division is a process you perform using numbers. It lets you find out how many times one number is contained within another. In the App, you must use the divide (÷) button to perform the division operation. In this process, we take a larger number and break it down into smaller, equal groups by dividing it by another number.
